entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tuktoyaktuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -42.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tuktoyaktuk Airport 06:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -42.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: -46.6°C
Wind: S 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 40.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 40. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 47 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
